mapper.select:
SELECT iu.id, iu.login_name, iu.email, iu.real_name, iu.is_enabled, role.id AS role_id, role.name, role.code, role.is_enabled as role_is_enabled, role.is_built_in as role_is_built_in, imr.id FROM (
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TMP_PAGE.*, ROWNUM ROW_ID FROM (
SELECT * FROM iam_user iam_u JOIN ( SELECT imr.member_id, MAX(imr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE) as newest_date FROM iam_user LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.member_id = iam_user.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{sourceId} AND imr.source_type = #{sourceType}
AND iam_user.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.loginName}),'%')
AND iam_user.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.realName}),'%')
AND ir.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.roleName}),'%')
and ( iam_user.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR iam_user.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR ir.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR imr.member_type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )
GROUP BY imr.MEMBER_ID ) t ON iam_u.id = t.member_id
ORDER BY t.newest_date DESC
) TMP_PAGE
WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{start} + 1) * #{size}) ) WHERE ROW_ID > (#{start} * #{size})
ORDER BY TMP_PAGE.newest_date DESC
) iu LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON iu.id = imr.member_id LEFT JOIN iam_role role ON imr.role_id = role.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{sourceId} AND imr.source_type = #{sourceType} ORDER BY imr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT iu.*, ir.id as role_id, ir.name as role_name, ir.code as role_code FROM iam_user iu INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.`name` = #{labelName} INNER JOIN iam_role_label irl ON irl.label_id = il.id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = irl.role_id AND ir.is_enabled = TRUE AND ir.RESOURCE_LEVEL = 'project' INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.member_id = iu.id and imr.role_id=ir.id
imr.member_type = 'user' and imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId}
AND iu.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.loginName}),'%')
AND iu.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.realName}),'%')
AND iu.is_enabled = #{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.enabled}
AND ( iu.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR iu.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )
order by imr.creation_date desc

SELECT iam_user.* FROM iam_user JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT member_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE source_id = #{projectId} AND source_type = 'project' AND member_type = 'user' ) t ON iam_user.id = t.member_id WHERE 1=1
AND iam_user.id = #{userId}
AND iam_user.email LIKE concat(concat('%',#{email}),'%')
AND ( iam_user.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR iam_user.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )

SELECT iam_user.* FROM iam_user JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT member_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE source_id = #{sourceId} AND source_type = #{sourceType} AND member_type = 'user' ) t ON iam_user.id = t.member_id WHERE 1=1
AND iam_user.id = #{userId}
AND iam_user.email LIKE concat(concat('%',#{email}),'%')
AND ( iam_user.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR iam_user.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )

select iut.id,iut.target_login_name as login_name,iut.real_name, iut.is_enabled,iut.is_locked,iut.is_ldap,iut.is_admin,iut.object_version_number from ( select iu.*, case when iu.is_ldap=1 then iu.login_name else iu.email end as target_login_name from iam_user iu ) iut where iut.is_admin = 1
AND iut.target_login_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{loginName}), '%')
AND iut.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{realName}), '%')
AND ( iut.target_login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR iut.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
order by iut.id desc

SELECT login_name FROM iam_user WHERE login_name IN
#{item}

SELECT id FROM iam_user WHERE login_name IN
#{item}

UPDATE iam_user SET is_enabled = 0 WHERE id IN
#{item}

SELECT email FROM iam_user WHERE email IN
#{item}

SELECT phone FROM iam_user WHERE is_enabled=1 and phone in
#{item}
SELECT id from iam_user where is_enabled = 1

SELECT id, login_name, real_name, image_url, email FROM iam_user WHERE is_enabled = 1
AND ( login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )

select id, login_name, real_name, image_url, email from iam_user where organization_id = #{organizationId} and is_enabled = 1
AND ( login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
union select id, login_name, real_name, image_url, email from iam_user where organization_id != #{organizationId} and is_enabled = 1
AND ( login_name = #{params} OR real_name = #{params} )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iam_user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iam_user WHERE creation_date BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

select.if:
SELECT 0 AS id, 'Choerodon' AS name, 'Choerodon' AS code, 1 AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, 'site' as image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'site' AND imr.member_id = #{userId}
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
GROUP BY imr.source_type

SELECT fo.id, fo.name AS name, fo.code, fo.is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, fo.image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN fd_organization fo ON imr.source_id = fo.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fo.is_enabled = 1
AND fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
group by fo.id

SELECT fp.id, CONCAT(fo.name, CONCAT(' / ', fp.name)) AS name, fp.code, fp.is_enabled, imr.source_type, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(concat(concat(concat(ir.code, '|'), ir.name), '|'), ir.is_enabled)) AS roles, fp.image_url, fp.name AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON imr.source_id = fp.id INNER JOIN fd_organization fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND fp.is_enabled = 1
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%')
group by fp.id

mapper.select:
SELECT 0 AS id, 'Choerodon' AS name, 'Choerodon' AS code, 1 AS is_enabled, imr.source_type, LISTAGG(concat(concat(ir.name, ',enabled='), ir.is_enabled) , '\n') within group(ORDER BY imr.source_type) AS roles, 'site' as image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.source_type = 'site'
AND ( 'Choerodon' LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
GROUP BY imr.source_type UNION SELECT fo.id, fo.name AS name, fo.code, fo.is_enabled, imr.source_type, LISTAGG(concat(concat(ir.name, ',enabled='), ir.is_enabled), '\n') within group(ORDER BY fo.id) AS roles, fo.image_url, null AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN fd_organization fo ON imr.source_id = fo.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND fo.is_enabled = 1
AND ( fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fo.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
group by fo.id, fo.name, fo.code, fo.is_enabled, imr.source_type UNION SELECT fp.id, CONCAT(fo.name, CONCAT('/', fp.name)) AS name, fp.code, fp.is_enabled, imr.source_type, LISTAGG(concat(concat(ir.name, ',enabled='), ir.is_enabled), '\n') within group(ORDER BY fp.id) AS roles, fp.image_url, fp.name AS proj_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON imr.source_id = fp.id INNER JOIN fd_organization fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND fp.is_enabled = 1
AND ( fp.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fp.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
group by fp.id, fo.name, fp.name, fp.code, fp.is_enabled, imr.source_type

SELECT iut.id, iut.target_login_name as login_name, iut.EMAIL, iut.ORGANIZATION_ID, iut.REAL_NAME, iut.IS_ENABLED AS enabled, iut.IS_LOCKED AS locked, iut.IS_LDAP AS ldap, imr.creation_date FROM iam_member_role imr LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.ID = imr.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN ( select iu.*, case when iu.is_ldap=1 then iu.login_name else iu.email end as target_login_name from iam_user iu ) iut ON imr.MEMBER_ID = iut.ID WHERE ir.CODE = 'role/organization/default/administrator' AND imr.source_type='organization' AND imr.source_id=#{organizationId} AND imr.member_type = 'user'
AND iut.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{realName }),'%')
and iut.target_login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{loginName}),'%')
AND ( iut.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR iut.target_login_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )

select count(1) from ( select distinct iut.id from ( select iu.*, case when iu.is_ldap=1 then iu.login_name else iu.email end as target_login_name from iam_user iu ) iut
left join fd_organization fo on fo.id = iut.organization_id
left join iam_member_role imr on (imr.member_id = iut.id and imr.member_type = 'user') left join iam_role ir on ir.id = imr.role_id
and fo.name like concat(concat('%',#{orgName}),'%')
and imr.source_id = #{sourceId} and imr.source_type = #{sourceType} and ir.name like concat(concat('%',#{roleName}),'%')
and iut.real_name like concat(concat('%',#{realName}),'%')
and iut.target_login_name like concat(concat('%',#{loginName}),'%')
and iut.is_enabled = #{enabled}
and iut.is_locked = #{locked}
and ( iut.target_login_name like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') or iut.real_name like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
) t

select t.* from ( select iu.* from iam_user iu where iu.is_enabled = 1
and ( iu.real_name like concat('%', concat(#{userName}, '%')) or iu.login_name like concat('%', concat(#{userName}, '%')) )
and (iu.real_name = #{userName} or iu.login_name = #{userName})
union select iu2.* from iam_user iu2 where iu2.is_enabled = 1 and ( iu2.real_name like concat('%', concat(#{userName}, '%')) or iu2.login_name like concat('%', concat(#{userName}, '%')) )
and iu2.organization_id = #{sourceId}
and iu2.organization_id = ( select fp.organization_id from fd_project fp where fp.id = #{sourceId} )
)t

select count(imr.id) from iam_member_role imr left join iam_role ir on imr.role_id = ir.id where ir.code = 'role/organization/default/administrator' and imr.source_type = 'organization' and imr.member_type = 'user' and imr.source_id = #{organizationId} and imr.member_id = #{userId}

SELECT fp.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON imr.source_id = fp.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY fp.id

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId}

SELECT ir.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id} AND imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.`name` = 'project.gitlab.owner' INNER JOIN iam_role_label irl ON irl.label_id = il.id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = irl.role_id WHERE imr.role_id = ir.id AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId}

SELECT iu.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_user iu ON iu.id = imr.member_id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_role_label irl ON irl.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = irl.label_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND il.name = #{roleLable}

SELECT iu.* FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_user iu ON iu.id = imr.member_id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_role_label irl ON irl.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_label il ON il.id = irl.label_id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.source_id = #{projectId} AND imr.source_type = 'project' AND (il.name = 'project.owner' OR il.name = 'project.gitlab.owner' OR il.name = 'project.gitlab.developer')
AND (iu.login_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param}),'%') OR iu.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param}),'%'))
GROUP BY iu.id
SELECT DISTINCT iu.id, iu.organization_id FROM iam_user iu ,iam_member_role imr WHERE iu.id=imr.member_id AND imr.role_id=#{roleId}

select * from iam_user iu where iu.is_enabled = true
AND iu.organization_id = #{organizationId}
AND iu.creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND iu.creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')

SELECT iu.id,iu.email,iu.real_name,iu.phone FROM iam_user iu JOIN iam_member_role imr ON iu.id =imr.member_id JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id=imr.role_id WHERE imr.source_type='project' AND ir.code='role/project/default/project-owner' AND imr.source_id=#{projectId}
